WarlockLevel8Spells.Name: Demiplane
WarlockLevel8Spells.Description: You create a shadowy door on a flat solid surface that you can see within range.

WarlockLevel8Spells.Name: Dominate Monster
WarlockLevel8Spells.Description: You attempt to beguile a creature that you can see within range.

WarlockLevel8Spells.Name: Feeblemind
WarlockLevel8Spells.Description: You blast the mind of a creature that you can see within range.

WarlockLevel8Spells.Name: Glibness
WarlockLevel8Spells.Description: Until the spell ends, when you make a Charisma check, you can replace the number you roll with a 15.

WarlockLevel8Spells.Name: Power Word Stun
WarlockLevel8Spells.Description: You speak a word of power that can overwhelm the mind of one creature you can see within range.
